definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Phoenix, capital of Arizona/also 鳳凰城|凤凰城[Feng4 huang2 cheng2]

pinyin: Du4 bu4 luo2 fu1 ni2 ke4

definition: Sputnik, Soviet artificial Earth satellite/also written 斯普特尼克
RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912
Titus Andronicus, 1593 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
pinyin: Tai4 te4 si1 · An1 de2 luo4 ni2 ke4 si1

sentences.english: I conveyed Nixon's crucial decision to Dinitz.

sentences.english: The spark that ignited their partnership was provided by Mr. Wozniak’s mother.
sentences.chinese: 點燃兩人合作之火的火花來自沃茲尼克的母親。

sentences.english: The Knicks will score, but not as much as the Celtics.
sentences.chinese: 尼克斯可以不斷取分，但會發現總是不如凱爾特人多。

sentences.english: Following Nixon's visit to China, the Chinese team came to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松訪華後，中國乒乓球隊回訪了美國。

sentences.english: D'Antoni spoke about what Hill may be able to bring to the Knicks.
sentences.chinese: 德安東尼也說了希爾會給尼克斯帶來什麼。

sentences.english: It is very smooth (Churchill used to enjoy similar wines from nearby Melnik).
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾也曾在附近的梅爾尼克品嚐過類似的酒。

sentences.chinese: 在他跟教練談完了之後，尼克向迪安跑去。

sentences.english: Thank you for saying that, Nick.

sentences.english: Nick Rennie was born on the pacific island of Bougainville in 1974.
sentences.chinese: 尼克1974年出生於太平洋島布干維爾島。

sentences.english: It is a fictionalized account of the sinking of the RMS Titanic.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部根據RMS泰坦尼克號沉沒改編的小說。

sentences.english: Nick giggled;the first exprression of mirth he had exhibited.
sentences.chinese: 尼克喫喫地笑了，他第一次顯出開心的模樣。

sentences.english: I was actually thinking of Nick.
sentences.chinese: 我實際上腦子裏想的是尼克。

sentences.english: While in Iraq, Brown processed insurgents and detainees , the NYCLU said.
